rules_text:
[i]Song of Creation[/i] – When you cast Sothis & Rhea, untap all permanents you control.
[i]Girl on the Throne[/i] – When Sothis & Rhea enter, create a Throne token and attach it to Sothis & Rhea.
[i]Divine Pulse[/i] – Untap all permanents you control during each other players untap step.
